:::Ratchet/Sideswipe/Torca/Sharpedge:::

Ratchet: I believe that the ark has no weaponry left, but you may take one of 
my blasters.
Sideswipe: Take my gun.  We'll defend the ark.
::Torca walks out of the shadows, had heard the whole thing::
Torca: I'll help.  Take my swords.
Ratchet: Okay, now with these weapons, the bots in that ship, and some more 
help from the CF, i think you guys can pull it off.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------
Sharpedge: I wish i had someone to get revenge on!
